title: Vetiver Essential Oil
description: In India and Sri Lanka, Vetiver is known as the "oil of tranquility" for its calming and grounding effect on the mind, body and spirit. This earthy, rich oil has many applications. Try a drop in your facial cleanser, perfect in bath and massage oil, and diffuse at the end of the day for mental exhaustion.
cleaned_text: In India and Sri Lanka, Vetiver is known as the "oil of tranquility" for its calming and grounding effect on the mind, body and spirit. Vetiver adds an earthy element to exotic fragrances. It is said to help with rest and soothing mental exhaustion.Uses of Vetiver Essential Oil IndonesiaHistory and Background In Chinese medicine, cool and moist energy, earth element, clears heat, nourishes, calms and uplifts, supports yin functions. Relaxes overactive mind and nurtures self-identity. Comforting to those feeling uprooted or without stability. Good for the perfectionist who loses touch with being.Physical Description Dark brown in color and with thick, viscous consistency.Aromatic Description Vetiver has a deep, hearty, woody, musky, myrrh-like, subtle Makeup and Components Vetiverol, vitivone, terpenes (vetiverenes)Extraction Technique Vetiver essential oil is extracted by steam distillation from roots and rootlets.Information for Aromatherapists This middle to base note is an excellent fixative.
